description: Triangular array in which n-th row consists of the numbers 1^1, 2^2, ... n^n.
comments: Sequence B is called a reluctant sequence of sequence A, if B is triangle array read by rows: row number k coincides with first k elements of the sequence A.  Sequence A033918 is the reluctant sequence of A000312 (number of labeled mappings from n points to themselves, endofunctions): n^n.  - Boris Putievskiy, Dec 14 2012
links: Timur I Khantimirov and Boris Putievskiy (first 51 from Timur I Khantimirov), Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Boris Putievskiy, Transformations Integer Sequences And Pairing Functions arXiv:1212.2732 [math.CO]
formula: a(n) = A000312(m), where m= n-t(t+1)/2, t=floor[(-1+sqrt(8*n-7))/2] or a(n)=(n-t(t+1)/2)^(n-t(t+1)/2), where t=floor[(-1+sqrt(8*n-7))/2]. - Boris Putievskiy, Dec 14 2012
author: Timur I Khantimirov (Tim(AT)sbbank.udm.ru)
